name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reply Wizard - Customizable AI Reply Generator for Twitter and LinkedIn

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reply Wizard listens to your prompt! Grow your socials with customisable, engaging replies. Works for X, LinkedIn and YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reply Wizard listens to your prompt! 

Grow your socials with customisable, engaging replies. Works for X, LinkedIn and YouTube.

The first reply tool you can customise with your own prompts! 

It takes time to think of cool tweets and interesting replies, right? Well, not anymore!

Press Reply Wizard's button and generate engaging replies based on a prompt provided by you. Edit to your liking and post!

Here is how it works: 

🧩 Install Chrome Extension 
📧 Verify Your Email
❓ Provide Your Prompt
𝕏 Go on Twitter or LinkedIn 
💬 Start Replying!

Sentence generator and reworder: 

🔄 Have a reply in mind? Write it and Reply Wizard will reword it.
⚡ Generate punchy sentences based on your prompt
🆕 Need a new prompt? Provide it any time and click 'Save'

Moods: 

🫣 Controversial
👏 Applause
🤔 Disagreement
🤬 Angry
🫣 Provocative
✅ Any moood you can think of - just tell the wizard! 

Works for: 

𝕏  Twitter (X) replies
🖇️ LinkedIn comments
▶️YouTube comments

Reply Wizard protects your data:

‣ No risk to be flagged for spam: Everything happens in your browser
‣ Security-first
‣ We'll never compromise your privacy
‣ No access to any sensitive browser data, like passwords or cookies
‣ Data we collect is exclusively used to improve Reply Wizard and bring better replies to you!

Try it out with 30 replies for free! 

Do you like our extension? Please leave a review, it helps us a lot.

Thank you and happy growing! 

****Feedback is always welcome through DM https://x.com/ReplyWizard or Email <replywizardio@gmail.com>
